hero.heroText: Take the First Step Toward Your Health and Happiness

introduce.introduceText: As a professional Reiki Master, I help to find balance and inner strength, leading people on the path of self-discovery through healing and support.

services.servicesText: These are the different ways I can support your wellness journey:

servicesCard1.title: Individual Session
servicesCard1.text: Reiki is a profound energy healing practice where I, as a practitioner, assist clients in accessing their inner peace and balance. Through gentle touch and energy transfer, I guide individuals to release blockages, promote healing, and enhance their well-being.

servicesCard2.title: Group Sessions
servicesCard2.text: Reiki is a unique method of energy healing rooted in ancient Japanese traditions. In group sessions, I, as a Reiki practitioner, help clients restore their energy and harmony through touch, meditation, and alignment with positive vibrations.

servicesCard3.title: Reiki Meditation
servicesCard3.text: Reiki meditation provides a unique opportunity to explore energy healing within. As a certified guide, I lead individuals through meditative practices rooted in Reiki principles, helping them tap into healing energy for self-awareness, balance, and relaxation.

servicesCard4.title: Reiki Training
servicesCard4.text: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques. As a certified instructor, I guide students through the principles of Reiki, enabling them to harness healing energy for themselves and others. This journey promotes personal growth.

certification.title: Qualification and Сertification
certification.text: I proudly share my Reiki Master certificate, along with achievements from other training events. May this inspire you to begin your own journey of growth and healing through Reiki.

cards.certificationCard1: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques.

steps.title: How does Reiki Practice Works
steps.text: Reiki is an energy healing practice that promotes relaxation, balance, and healing by channeling life force energy.

step1.title: Book an appointment
step1.text: This step will help you make yourself known and receive valuable feedback.

step2.title: Receive your tailored consultation
step2.text: This step provides you with personalized insights and expert guidance to address your unique needs and goals.

step3.title: Ongoing and circular care
step3.text: Experience continuous, interconnected support designed to nurture and sustain your well-being over time.

step4.title: Begin your treatment and program
step4.text: Take the first step toward achieving your goals with a personalized plan designed just for you.

questions.questions1: What is Reiki, and how does it work?
questions.questions2: What’s the difference between Reiki and traditional medicine?
questions.questions3: How do I know if Reiki is right for me?
questions.questions4: Is Reiki only for people with health issues?
questions.questions5: Do you offer a free initial consultation?
questions.questions6: How long does a typical Reiki session last?
questions.questions7: How private and confidential is a Reiki session?
questions.questions8: Is there a specific location for in-person Reiki sessions?
questions.questions9: Do you offer Reiki sessions in-person, online, or both?

answers.answers1: Reiki is a gentle energy healing practice that promotes relaxation and balance by channeling universal life energy through the hands of a practitioner.
answers.answers2: Reiki is a holistic, complementary therapy that supports overall well-being, while traditional medicine focuses on diagnosing and treating specific medical conditions.
answers.answers3: If you're looking for relaxation, stress relief, or energetic balance, Reiki may be beneficial. You’re welcome to try a session and see how it feels for you.
answers.answers4: No, Reiki is for anyone seeking relaxation, emotional balance, or personal growth, regardless of health status.
answers.answers5: Yes, I offer a brief initial consultation to discuss your needs and answer any questions.
answers.answers6: A standard session lasts between 45 to 60 minutes.
answers.answers7: Reiki sessions are completely private and confidential, ensuring a safe and comfortable experience.
answers.answers8: Yes, in-person sessions are available at the Athlone studio.
answers.answers9: I offer both in-person and online Reiki sessions to accommodate different preferences.
